title: MaterialRegistry Audit
verdict: PASS - MaterialRegistry is well-structured with 4-layer hierarchy, ISO group indexing, and W5 safety guard

registry_overview.loading_pattern: Loads from 7 ISO group directories (P/M/K/N/S/H/X) under EXTRACTED_DIR/materials/
registry_overview.data_layers: CORE -> ENHANCED -> USER -> LEARNED (4-layer hierarchy from BaseRegistry)

advanced_coefficients.kienzle: kc1_1, mc for cutting force prediction
advanced_coefficients.johnson_cook: A, B, C, n, m for dynamic flow stress
advanced_coefficients.taylor: C, n for tool life prediction

indexes.indexByISO: Map<string, string[]> - ISO group -> id[] lookup

safety_features.W5_guard: Only marks loaded=true if entries.size > 0, otherwise logs warning and leaves loaded=false for retry on next call

count_discrepancy.note: Count grew from enrichment waves W3-W6. Manager header is most current.
